title: The Sims Legacy Collection
description:
The original game you know and love. For Windows 10/11.
Create an entire neighborhood of Sims and run or ruin their lives. Help them pursue careers, make friends, and find romance — or see what happens when you let chaos unfold! Open-ended gameplay gives you the freedom to set your own goals and chart your Sims’ destinies. It is your neighborhood, and they are your Sims. Whether they prosper or perish is completely up to you. Ace Attorney Investigations Collection

system_requirements.Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 600, AMD Radeon HD 7000, Intel HD  620
